text: "On Every Street" is a 1992 song by British rock band Dire Straits and is the title track to their sixth studio album On Every Street. The B-side is the 1980 song Romeo and Juliet. It went to number 42 in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands, number 109 in Australia and number 23 in France. ==Track listing== 7-inch single # "On Every Street" # "Romeo and Juliet" ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Dire Straits songs
title: On Every Street (song)
